title: SOLD: T213-2 Coupon Cigs Hal Chase Dark Cap (Chicago)

posts.post_title: SOLD: T213-2 Coupon Cigs Hal Chase Dark Cap (Chicago)
posts.post_content:
Rare card of Hal Chase.  Only one graded by SGC with the Chicago White Sox variation. 
[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/6419626487/"][IMG]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7028/6419626487_ff630678f8_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

I'll take it. PM on the way!
Jeff
that sgc one is the one i have :)
